casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana IN the INTEREST OF Z.D. NO. 2017-CJ-2118 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 14, 2018

Granted. The case is remanded to the court of appeal, which is instructed to convert relator's appeal to an application for supervisory writs and consider the application on the merits. See Stelluto v. Stelluto, 05-007 (La. 6/29/05), 914 So.2d 34.
